1621856434_1H7zNGEgo9AgbdKHhwoWzfeNqrav5.body:
> [robione](#comment_649_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): Use the clone feature?

It isn't available as an option. any ideas?

> [robione](#comment_650_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): Like @styromaniac said, look at the URL of the zite, find it's directory in your ZN installation folder and manually copy its contents to a new zite you just created. You'll have to manually adjust the config files too.

thanks for this. I assumed that the 'clone' option in the right-click menu on the Zite entry on the main page was missing because it wasn't, in some way, copyable. I'll try your suggestion +1
